newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Call girls fall victim to Amsterdam summit security.
newsitem.headline: Call girls fall victim to Amsterdam summit security.

text.p: Amsterdam's call girls say they are being discriminated against by tight security surrounding the forthcoming meeting of European Union leaders in the Dutch capital, ANP news agency said on Saturday.
The police have introduced strict controls on who will be allowed into the city's hotels, where hundreds of politicians and officials will be staying for the summit on June 16 and 17.
Entry passes have been issued to caterers and other delivery firms, but escort agencies have been refused.
"Our work must continue. If a client in one these hotels wants our services, a girl must be allowed to visit," ANP quoted the owner of one agency, Club Non Stop, as saying.
